name: Reef Isles
role_in_state: secondary maritime repair and transshipment hub
culture_adjustments: islander dialect of Coastal Tongues with reef-specific terms
shipwright clans and house-collectives overshadow formal guild halls
tide-calendar variants controlling work and augury schedules
strong acceptance of pragmatic smuggling and barter networks
constraints: shallow waters limit large-dock heavy industry
ritual reagents reliant on imported supply lines
notes: favored waypoint for State_2 coastal convoys
local augury practices adapted to microtides
informal regulatory zone for reagent trade
